blogPost.excerpt:
"When It's All Said And Done...Take Time" available at: https://Giveon.lnk.to/WhenItsAllSaidAndDone_TakeTime
"Heartbreak Anniversary" Official Audio: https://youtu.be/nja_0BaQcNg

Follow Giveon:
Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/giveon/?hl=en
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/giveon?lang=en
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/Giveonmusic/
Soundcloud:  https://soundcloud.com/giveon

Lyrics:
Ooh

Balloons are deflated
Guess they look lifeless like me
We miss you on your side of the bed, mmm
Still got your things here
And they stare at me like souvenirs
Don't wanna let you out my head

Just like the day that I met you, the day I thought forever
Said that you love me, but that'll last for never
It's cold outside like when you walked out my life
Why you walk out my life?

I get like this every time
On these days that feel like you and me
Heartbreak anniversary
'Cause I remember every time
On these days that feel like you and me
Heartbreak anniversary, do you ever think of me?
(Oh-ooh) No
(Ooh) No, no, no
(Ooh, ooh) Ooh, nah (Ooh)

I'm buildin' my hopes up
Like presents unopened to this day
I still see the messages you read, mmm
I'm foolishly patient (Foolishly patient)
Can't get past the taste of your lips (Taste of your lips)
Don't wanna let you out my head

Just like the day that I met you, the day I thought forever
Said that you love me but that'll last for never
It's cold outside like when you walked out my life
Why you walk out my life? (My life)

I get like this every time
On these days that feel like you and me
Heartbreak anniversary
'Cause I remember every time
On these days that feel like you and me
Heartbreak anniversary, do you ever think of me?
(Oh-ooh) Of me
(Ooh) 'Cause I think of you, think of you
(Ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh)

(C) 2021 Epic Records. With Not So Fast LLC.

#Giveon #HeartbreakAnniversary #WhenItsAllSaidAndDoneTakeTime
blogPost.body:
"When It's All Said And Done...Take Time" available at: https://Giveon.lnk.to/WhenItsAllSaidAndDone_TakeTime
"Heartbreak Anniversary" Official Audio: https://youtu.be/nja_0BaQcNg

Follow Giveon:

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/giveon?lang=en
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/Giveonmusic/
Soundcloud:  https://soundcloud.com/giveon

Lyrics:
Ooh

Balloons are deflated
Guess they look lifeless like me
We miss you on your side of the bed, mmm
Still got your things here
And they stare at me like souvenirs
Don't wanna let you out my head

Just like the day that I met you, the day I thought forever
Said that you love me, but that'll last for never
It's cold outside like when you walked out my life
Why you walk out my life?

I get like this every time
On these days that feel like you and me
Heartbreak anniversary
'Cause I remember every time
On these days that feel like you and me
Heartbreak anniversary, do you ever think of me?
(Oh-ooh) No
(Ooh) No, no, no
(Ooh, ooh) Ooh, nah (Ooh)

I'm buildin' my hopes up
Like presents unopened to this day
I still see the messages you read, mmm
I'm foolishly patient (Foolishly patient)
Can't get past the taste of your lips (Taste of your lips)
Don't wanna let you out my head

Just like the day that I met you, the day I thought forever
Said that you love me but that'll last for never
It's cold outside like when you walked out my life
Why you walk out my life? (My life)

I get like this every time
On these days that feel like you and me
Heartbreak anniversary
'Cause I remember every time
On these days that feel like you and me
Heartbreak anniversary, do you ever think of me?
(Oh-ooh) Of me
(Ooh) 'Cause I think of you, think of you
(Ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh)

(C) 2021 Epic Records. With Not So Fast LLC.

#Giveon #HeartbreakAnniversary #WhenItsAllSaidAndDoneTakeTime
blogPost.title: Giveon - Heartbreak Anniversary (Official Music Video)
blogPost.author: GiveonVEVO

localize.title: Giveon - Heartbreak Anniversary (Official Music Video)
localize.description:
"When It's All Said And Done...Take Time" available at: https://Giveon.lnk.to/WhenItsAllSaidAndDone_TakeTime.
"心碎周年 "官方音频：https://youtu.be/nja_0BaQcNg

关注Giveon。
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/giveon/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/giveon?lang=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Giveonmusic/
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/giveon

歌词：
哦

气球已放气
我猜他们和我一样，看起来毫无生气
我们在你的床上想你，嗯哼
你的东西还在这里
他们像纪念品一样盯着我看
不想让你离开我的脑袋

就像我遇见你的那天，我以为永远的那天
说过你爱我，但那永远不会持久
外面很冷，就像你走出我的生活一样。
你为什么要离开我的生活？

我每次都会这样
在这些感觉像你和我的日子里
心碎纪念日
因为我每次都记得
在这些感觉像你和我的日子里
心碎纪念日，你有没有想过我？
(哦哦)没有
（哦）不，不，不
(哦，哦) 哦，不 (哦)

我正在建立我的希望
就像至今未开封的礼物
我还能看到你看的留言，嗯哼
我傻傻地忍耐（傻傻地忍耐）。
过不了嘴唇的味道（Taste of your lips）。
不想让你离开我的脑袋

就像我遇见你的那天，我以为永远的那天
说过你爱我，但那永远不会持久
外面很冷，就像你走出我的生活一样。
你为什么走出我的生活？（我的生活）

我每次都会这样
在这些感觉像你和我的日子里
心碎纪念日
因为我每次都记得
在这些感觉像你和我的日子里
心碎纪念日，你有没有想过我？
（哦哦）我
因为我想到了你，想到了你
(哦，哦，哦，哦)

(C) 2021 Epic Records。与Not So Fast LLC.

#Giveon #HeartbreakAnniversary #WhenItsAllSaidAndDoneTakeTime#。

localize.title: Giveon - Heartbreak Anniversary (Official Music Video)
localize.description:
"When It's All Said And Done...Take Time" available at: https://Giveon.lnk.to/WhenItsAllSaidAndDone_TakeTime.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/giveon?lang=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Giveonmusic/
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/giveon

歌詞：
哦

氣球已放氣
我猜他們和我一樣，看起來毫無生氣
我們在你的牀上想你，嗯哼
你的東西還在這裏
他們像紀念品一樣盯着我看
不想讓你離開我的腦袋

就像我遇見你的那天，我以爲永遠的那天
說過你愛我，但那永遠不會持久
外面很冷，就像你走出我的生活一樣。
你爲什麼要離開我的生活？

我每次都會這樣
在這些感覺像你和我的日子裏
心碎紀念日
因爲我每次都記得
在這些感覺像你和我的日子裏
心碎紀念日，你有沒有想過我？
(哦哦)沒有
（哦）不，不，不
(哦，哦) 哦，不 (哦)

我正在建立我的希望
就像至今未開封的禮物
我還能看到你看的留言，嗯哼
我傻傻地忍耐（傻傻地忍耐）。
過不了嘴脣的味道（Taste of your lips）。
不想讓你離開我的腦袋

就像我遇見你的那天，我以爲永遠的那天
說過你愛我，但那永遠不會持久
外面很冷，就像你走出我的生活一樣。
你爲什麼走出我的生活？（我的生活）

我每次都會這樣
在這些感覺像你和我的日子裏
心碎紀念日
因爲我每次都記得
在這些感覺像你和我的日子裏
心碎紀念日，你有沒有想過我？
（哦哦）我
因爲我想到了你，想到了你
(哦，哦，哦，哦)

(C) 2021 Epic Records。與Not So Fast LLC.
